distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for OpenIPMI fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-42934: crash or message authentication bypass on IPMI simulator due to missing bounds check. (bsc#1229910)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use
